verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2446>Hachaliah.<s%> And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H3691>Chisleu,<s%> in the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> as <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace,<s%>

That <S%H2607>Hanani,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of my <S%H4480>brethren,<s%> <S%H251><s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> and certain <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4480>Judah;<s%> <S%H3063><s%> and I <S%H7592>asked<s%> them <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that had <S%H6413>escaped,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, The <S%H7604>remnant<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H4082>province<s%> are in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>affliction<s%> and <S%H2781>reproach:<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> also is broken <S%H6555>down,<s%> and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> thereof are <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> that I sat <S%H3427>down<s%> and <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and <S%H56>mourned<s%> certain <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H1961>fasted,<s%> <S%H6684><s%> and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H577>beseech<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> for them that <S%H157>love<s%> him and <S%H8104>observe<s%> his commandments: <S%H4687><s%>

Let thine <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7183>attentive,<s%> and thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H6605>open,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee <S%H3117>now,<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee: both <S%H589>I<s%> and my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

We have dealt very <S%H2254>corruptly<s%> <S%H2254><s%> against thee, and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> nor the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> nor the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H6680>commandedst<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> I <S%H4994>beseech<s%> <S%H853>thee,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H6680>commandedst<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> If <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H4603>transgress,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will scatter you <S%H6327>abroad<s%> <S%H853><s%> among the nations: <S%H5971><s%>

But if ye <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them; <S%H518>though<s%> there <S%H1961>were<s%> of you cast <S%H5080>out<s%> unto the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> yet will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from <S%H4480>thence,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H7931>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Now <S%H1992>these<s%> are thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> and thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> by thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power,<s%> and by thy <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> I <S%H577>beseech<s%> thee, let <S%H4994>now<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7183>attentive<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> who <S%H2655>desire<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8034>name:<s%> and <S%H6743>prosper,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> thee, thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5414>grant<s%> him <S%H7356>mercy<s%> in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%> For <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4945>cupbearer.<s%>
